data.name: Kaku Ancient Seal Demo
data.detailed_description:
· If you have any questions you would like to share with us, how can you contact us?
We will interact and discuss with you in the official group. We will also carefully read the comments on Steam community and the discussion section of social media. We hope that you can evaluate us comprehensively and help the game grow.
Steam Community discussion group：https://steamcommunity.com/app/1179580/discussions/
Twitter/Instagram/Youtube/Reddit/Discord：@KakuAncientSeal

"Kaku Ancient Seal" is an easy and amusing adventure game. In ancient times,You will become an teenager with an adorable pet, explor and adventure in an open Fantastic world. In this game,we have a unique artistic style, interesting Puzzle design and a happy journey, are you ready to the Oraka mainland?
 
Game Features and gameplay:
In this game, you will become a boy named Kaku , explore and adventure in the open Fantastic world with your pets, find the lost temples scattered in the depths of the world, gain the power of the four ancient elements, search the truth of world creation,defeat the evil and save the world finaly!
 

1. Fantastic and unique artistic style

The game is developed based on the UE4 engine. Its artistic style combines real scenes and cartoon characters, showing the peculiar visual effects of fairy tales.

 

2. Simple operation and easy battle

The fighting mechanism is inspired by arcade games. You can experience the combat sensation and visual impact of different actions by releasing the powerful skill with simple operation. Players of all ages and levels can easily play the game and enjoy pure fun in the game.

 

3. Ingenious and interesting Puzzle design

Ingenious and interesting Puzzle solving, You just need to be full of curiosity to enter the game and meet unknown challenges!

4. an emotional story

The brave boy Kaku embarks on an adventure to save the world.During the journey，cute pets who like money and partners with different personalities will fight the insidious PENGPENG, overcome challenges and ultimately defeat the evil forces.

data.short_description: "Kaku: Ancient Seal is our latest epic adventure game. You play Kaku, a heroic young boy who embarks on an exciting adventure with his loyal pet, in a sprawling fantasy world set in an ancient, forgotten time. Are you ready to leave your legacy in the world of Oraka?

fullgame.name: KAKU: Ancient Seal / 卡库远古封印

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 以上
  • Processor: i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660/GTX1050 or AMD Radeon HD7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 64 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
